evidence.source_document: Underlying Decision from Which Petition Arises
evidence.text: This petition arises from the following rule promulgated by the United States Environmental Protection Agency: “New Source Performance Standards for the Synthetic Organic Chemical Manufacturing Industry and National Emission Standards for Hazardous Air Pollutants for the Synthetic Organic Chemical Manufacturing Industry and Group I & II Polymers and Resins Industry,” 89 Fed. Reg. 42,932 (May 16, 2024) (Docket No. EPA-HQ-OAR-2022-0730-2763).
